title: PB to TB Converter â€“ Petabytes to Terabytes (Decimal & Binary)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Decimal SI (used by vendors) \(1~\text{PB} = 10^{15}~\text{bytes}\) \(1~\text{TB} = 10^{12}~\text{bytes}\) \(1~\text{PB} = 1000~\text{TB}\) Binary IEC (used by OS) \(1~\text{PiB} = 2^{50}~\text{bytes}\) \(1~\text{TiB} = 2^{40}~\text{bytes}\) \(1~\text{PiB} = 1024~\text{TiB}\)
